channel.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
channel.description: I created https://soundcloud.com/user-460338301/movement in August last year. Recently I have been creating a VIP version of it. I don't really know too much about VIP versions of songs so I'm not sure how different you make the song but I made it _pretty_ different. Maybe it's sorta like a remix. Anyway, this is the VIP version: https://soundcloud.com/user-460338301/movement-vip Feedback is, as always, appreciated. Enjoy! :grin:

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: HYDRANS
item.description:
VIP means Variation In Production
just FYI

Read full topic

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
I get it and as I read up on it, yes, your right, but I think that things have changed a bit since then in that you can easily find VIP tracks by artists that are just out there (example: Festivillanz. They release a VIP of nearly all their old tracks for free).

Some of them are still exclusives for a show (Pegboard Nerds - Melodymania VIP) and may or may not make it to public (this VIP did)

But to each their own.

Read full topic

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: Mr_Mooo
item.description:
Haha it’s totally fine. I’m enjoying learning about VIP mixes.

Read full topic

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
Sorry Mr_Mooo, we’ve hijacked your thread!

I really liked the original!
It reminded me of early Chicago House.

Read full topic

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
VIP remixes stem from the dubplate culture created around soundsystem music.

Typically, they are not released, with only a few copies made, which are shared amongst the artist and friends.
They are part of the reason people travel to the other side of the country to hear a DJ set.

“Man, you should have been there! He played the VIP remix of (insert favourite song here)!”

Read full topic

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
I was under the belief that
VIP = remix/rework of one’s own track for any purpose/ general release
Exclusive remix = remix/rework for a specific set (hence exclusive)

: /

Read full topic

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
El1011:

VIP is more known/recognizable and it does apply to your track as it’s a remix of your own track that you’re not keeping for a special set or anything.

Was that a typo?
That’s the exact opposite of what a VIP mix is.

Read full topic

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: Mr_Mooo
item.description:
Great! I’ll keep it then.

Read full topic

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
I’d keep it VIP imo. VIP is more known/recognizable and it does apply to your track as it’s a remix of your own track that you’re not keeping for a special set or anything. VIP’s are just any remix of an artist’s own track, regardless of how much has changed

Read full topic

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: Mr_Mooo
item.description:
Thanks so much!

Read full topic

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
Mr_Mooo:

Shall I change VIP to exclusive remix? Or is VIP fine?

It’s your music, you can label it however you like.

I just wanted to illustrate that a VIP remix has actual historic meaning, and is not just a marketing term.

Read full topic

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
Heyyyy das some serious improvement.

Read full topic

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: Mr_Mooo
item.description:
Haha you seem to know what you’re talking about. Shall I change VIP to exclusive remix? Or is VIP fine?

Read full topic

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
Mr_Mooo:

I don’t really know too much about VIP versions of songs so I’m not sure how different you make the song but I made it pretty different. Maybe it’s sorta like a remix.

FYI, it’s just an exclusive remix, typically done by the original artist, for use in their (and perhaps a very select few) live sets.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Movement VIP - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: Graye
item.description:
My favorite part of the song is at like 30 seconds

And the drop hits hard!

The second part of the drop I noticed you added hi hats, which was a good choice for the genre…but the Hihat sample just didn’t sound like it fit well enough to me.

Something I learned sorta recently is by turning the hipass all the way up on the hihats makes them sound more gooooder

Read full topic
